jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
A man grabs a woman from behind
Through the open bedroom door, a hand suddenly appears in the hallway from the right
A hand suddenly reaches a woman from behind and covers her mouth
A dark figure starts to get up in the background
A foot suddenly appears from under the bed
A girl suddenly appears at the window as Belle shuts it
James suddenly opens his eyes
Belle briefly sees James in the mirror
Accompanied by a sound effect, Belle sees blood on the bed
Belle turns around and a man is behind her with a gun
Terrence suddenly appears at the door wearing a pig mask
The fuse box sparks and the man with the gun briefly appears
Juliet sees James in the closet
James suddenly grabs Belle by the hair
Juliet sees a dead animal in the water
Joan knocks Belle out
Samuel jumps out and grabs his daughter (as a joke)
A sudden cut to Samuel banging on a car wheel with a tire iron may startle some viewers
A broken doll falls to the ground
Samuel grabs Janice’s hand as she goes to open a door
A shutter slides back up startling Sister Charlotte
Linda sees the doll which, accompanied by a loud noise, suddenly disappears into the darkness
The demon suddenly appears inside the tent and puts her hand on the face of one of the girls
The girl at the window turns around to reveal a demonic face
After several seconds silence, Janice is suddenly pulled off her chair into the air by an unseen force
Janice falls back to the ground
The toy gun is suddenly pulled out of Linda’s hand
Janice’s wheelchair is hit by an unseen force
Janice’s wheelchair is flung away from Janice’s outstretched hand
Bee suddenly begins crawling towards Janice
Hands come out of the well and pull Linda into it
Linda is suddenly pulled across the ground
After the scarecrow disappears, Kate suddenly bangs on the truck door scaring the girls inside
There is a loud bang on the door as Linda tries to open the window
After several seconds of silence, a hand comes from off screen to break the lightbulb beside Carol
There are several loud bangs on the door
Esther’s torso suddenly comes to life and chases after Linda
Janice suddenly bursts into the room where Linda is hiding
Annabelle suddenly appears at the door to her parents bedroom
Jackson turns his head to reveal some blood
The boy appears at the back door
The boy runs across the living room
Sarah notices the strangled man on the floor
The detective walks back into the room and shoots herself
The detective opens her eyes and there is a loud drum sound
The handyman slams into the side window of the car
A girl is pulled away by an evil entity. This is used a few times in the movie so it won’t be terrifying or startling

After a couple seconds of silence and buildup, the possessed and demonic Claire runs with a knife in front of the camera and her sister. This is probably the most effective jump scare since it was somewhat unexpected
The elevator making a loud noise might startle some viewers. Not that something particularly frightening is happening, just the noise is quite startling
Claire is pulled away by an evil entity
Claire is attacked by an entity
A door slams
The old lady is pulled by the evil force
An evil entity suddenly runs at the main character in the mirror
Jude scares Lisa from behind as she stands by the shoes
The lights come on and suddenly a masked man stands behind Lisa
When Lisa is sleeping, she is suddenly strangled
After Lisa says “This is where you found him,” a cut follows and a dog suddenly barks. It happens out of nowhere
Lisa is suddenly grabbed by a burglar
Brahms’ eyes turn white and suddenly flies fly from his mouth. The sound effect is very loud
When lisa is standing in the kitchen there is suddenly a bang
A silhouette whizzes past the window
When Lisa is behind the wall, a silhouette flies by behind her and a sound effect plays
As Lisa runs through the corridor, bats suddenly fly out of the ceiling
After Lisa finds Jude and they hug, something bangs on the door behind them and moves the handle
Accompanied by a sudden scream, the title card cuts in during a conversation
A sudden thud wakes up Isaac
The rabbit toy suddenly goes off and wakes up Isaac
As Isaac is looking around the hole, he shines the flashlight on a corpse
Accompanied by a sound cue, Olga suddenly grabs Isaac’s hand as he reaches in through the hole
Isaac turns the flashlight to his side, shining it on Olga covering her eyes while her nose bleeds
As Isaac is looking around the room with the flashlight, he shines it on Olga’s dad with blood all over his face
There is a sudden cut to the previous jump scare during a quiet moment
Isaac shines the flashlight on the mom while crawling through a duct, who quickly retreats out of frame
The ghost of Edith’s mother reaches out and touches Edith on the bed
The ghost of Edith’s mother turns around and screams at Edith
The ghost reaches through the door and grabs Edith. [Video]
A ghost appears at the half opened door and pulls it shut
A ghost appears out of the ground and begins crawling down the hallway towards Edith
A silhouette moves past the bedroom window
Edith is pulled to the floor by an unseen force
The ghost in the bathtub suddenly moves
Lucille lunges at Edith with a cleaver
The sheet on top of the doll suddenly lifts off and wraps itself around Lisa. [Video]
Jamie sees the doll standing beside his bed. [Video]
Jamie sees an old lady behind the curtain, the camera zooms in on her face
As the camera flashes, an image if Lisa’s dead face flashes up on the screen briefly
Jamie sees the doll in the drivers side window of the car. [Video]
Jamie comes out of the bathroom and sees the doll
Young Henry sees Mary’s dead body lying beside him
The reflection of a dead lady can be seen briefly in the mirror
Henry turns around and sees Mary Shaw behind him. [Video]
Detective Lipton begins speaking behind Jamie
The dead boy’s head jerks back, starling Detective Lipton
Detective Liptons dead body comes out from behind the curtain
Jamie sees Mary Shaw’s face as he tries to climb back on to the bridge
Mary Shaw comes through the window
Ella appears behind Jamie
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A figure appears in a dark doorway
A hand starts moving from behind the shower curtain
Accompanied by a loud sound, the shot abruptly changes to show an old lady in a bathtub
A hand grabs Dan’s hand
Abra suddenly opens her pupil-less, all white eyes
The shot abruptly changes to show Abra sitting on the edge of her bed, her eyes all white
Accompanied by a loud sound, a light suddenly turns on in a dark corridor
The shot abruptly changes to an axe going through a door accompanied by screams and noise
A hand print appears on the window, accompanied by a loud sound effect
Eli wakes up suddenly (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
A stone suddenly hits the window, startling Eli
As Eli wipes the condensation off the window, the girl jumps out and says “BOO!”
As Eli runs down the hallway, he shines the torch back into the darkness and the ghostly girl is suddenly running right towards him
The lights turn back on and a shadowy figure stands right behind Eli
The shadowy figure bursts through the curtain but it is revealed to only be Eli’s father
Eli moves the mirror slightly to reveal a ghostly girl standing in the room behind him
A hand suddenly grabs onto the cupboard
As Eli slowly turns around, a hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain
An invisible presence pulls at Eli’s top (not particularly startling however it is accompanied by a high pitched sound effect)
During a tense scene, the sound of the automatic door closing behind Eli may be startling to some
Rose pushes the top off the stone well to reveal several corpses inside
The clock begins to chime as Munder reaches out to touch it
Munder falls through the floor
As Epps climbs some steps she sees the ghost girl standing above her
Murphy looks in the mirror and sees the reflection of another man
Epps opens a door and a flood of water (along with several bodies) rushes out
Epps opens a wooden crate to reveal a large number of rats inside
Two bodies being held in hanging sacks start to struggle and scream. [Video]
All the doors to the passenger’s rooms suddenly close as Epps walks down a hallway
Epps opens a sliding door and is greeted by a decomposed corpse hanging from the ceiling
Murphy turns around and comes face to face with Santos
Murphy turns around and once again Santos is there
Francesca turns into a decomposed corpse
The doors burst open
A squirrel falls into the fireplace
Jump cut to some knocking
A ghost boy appears directly in front of the scope
The closet door behind the sniper slams shut
It is revealed to be a ghost woman standing at the desk
A nazi body falls and is hanged
The boy appears in the water and then a moment later behind the soldier
The ghost woman appears and screams
The woman appears behind the sniper
The door slams shut
There is a sudden loud noise and the camera goes fuzzy
Sasha’s hair gets lifted from behind
T.C. gets pushed down the stairs
A bed frame lifts off the ground
A girl runs through the hallway
The film crew approach a girl in the corner of a room when she spins around and screams
A hand breaks through the door behind Sasha and grabs her
Someone jumps out of a bath tub full of blood and drags in T.C
Lance finds a tongue in the corner of the room, looks up, and sees a ghost on the roof
A figure runs at Lance in the hallway
Lance spins around to see a group of doctors working on a patient. Suddenly one jumps up close to Lance and screams
Pete opens his umbrella behind Miranda
Miranda sees a girl standing on the road
There is a sudden flashback to the girl on the bridge
An invisible presence breathes on the window in front of Miranda
The nurse’s hand reaches out to grab Miranda
There is a loud thump as Miranda walks down a corridor
Chloe’s face suddenly appears at the window of the cell door. [Video]
Miranda bends down to reveal Rachel standing behind her
Miranda turns around and screams as she sees Rachel’s face in front of her
An apparently unconscious Miranda suddenly jumps up and screams as a guard reaches down to check on her
While holding her breath underwater, Miranda opens her eyes and sees Rachel screaming at her. [Video]
Miranda sees Rachel in the rear view mirror
The car lights and stereo suddenly turn on
An owl startles Miranda
A policeman grabs Miranda on the shoulder
Hands grab at Miranda from underneath some steps
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
There is suddenly a loud sound as someone creeps through the house
After a loud noise, Julian turns around and George is standing right behind him at the doorframe
George turns on a light switch, revealing something in the basement that screeches and runs away
As George reaches out for a girl, her hand suddenly reaches out and grabs him
In a “false awakening” jump scare, George wakes up and turns to his side, and the girl suddenly jumps out at him
The car crash suddenly explodes into flames
Jim sees Mrs Hooper hanging from the ceiling
During a dream Roger is having, an arm comes up out of the ground beside a child
Roger opens a closet door and a monster attacks him
Harold appears by the door of Roger’s room
Sandy bends down to pick a bullet up off the floor, when she stands up she has been replaced by a monster
Roger opens the closet door and the monster is there
A tentacle comes out of the medicine cabinet hole and attacks Roger
A flying skeletal monster jumps out at Roger
The flying monster attacks Roger once more
Roger opens the front door and the skeleton of Big Ben is standing there
Big Ben comes out of a doorway and attacks Roger
A glass window suddenly breaks
A glass panel on the ceiling falls down
Some concrete blocks fall from the ceiling
Mr Price walks around a corner, startling the group
A ghost begins to move towards Melissa and several disturbing images flash across the screen
A gunshot may startle some viewers
A man’s chair is turned around to reveal he is missing his face
A woman with a distorted mouth and no eyes suddenly appears in front of Mr Price in the water
Pritchett starts talking which startles Sara and Eddie
Evelyn suddenly grabs Blackburn around the neck
A chamber door is opened to reveal a severed head
Mr Price appears in front of Sara
Mr Price suddenly grabs Evelyn
The floor begins to explode

The scene abruptly changes to a close up of dead Elise
Renai trips over a babies toy which begins to make noise
A kids toy suddenly turns on
Lorraine opens the bathroom door to reveal Josh
A mysterious lady appears standing behind Lorraine and Dalton
A singing lady appears in the living room
The kids high chair and toy suddenly go flying through the air
The mysterious lady appears suddenly, yells “Don’t you dare”, and slaps Renai. [Video]
Several images flash on the screen in quick succession as Carl senses something. [Video]
While in a hospital bed, Parker suddenly grabs young Josh
Renai suddenly wakes from a nightmare
Kids suddenly run out of the bedroom
A lady runs out of Dalton’s closet
Numerous apparitions appear beside Dalton’s bed. [Video]
The scene suddenly cuts to Josh yelling for help in “the further”
An old man suddenly appears in front of Josh chanting “he’s got your baby”. [Video]
A man appears in the window of the babies room
Josh’s face suddenly transforms into that of the evil lady
Josh backs into a room full of shrouded people

Josh and Carl are surrounded and attacked by a bunch of spirits
A boy runs past the screen in the background after Christian asks Elise “What are you doing?”
The boy in the closet appears beside Christian who is hiding in bed
A loud noise as Elise turns a crank may startle some viewers
There is a loud bang as the generator shuts off
There is a bang and the generator springs back into life
The spirit of Elise’s father carrying his wife passes by in front of Elise as she approaches the end of the hallway
A door suddenly being opened may startle some viewers
Elise reaches out to touch the ghost woman in front of her, suddenly the woman appears right beside Elise and says “help her”
As Elise is about to blow the whistle the girl suddenly appears beside her and knocks her over
Specs slams the door into Ted and his gun discharges
During an interview at the station, Elise looks up and sees a ghostly woman standing beside the detective (this is probably the biggest scare in the film as it occurs in a non-scary scene)
Melissa lifts a sheet to reveal a hand which throws her across the room
After a tense scene, Elise opens the final suitcase and Key Face reaches out and grabs her
Key Face throws Elise across the room
Elise has a vision of the demon from the first film looking through a window into Dalton’s bedroom
A truck plows into the drivers side of the car that Jessabelle and her boyfriend are in
Leon appears behind Jessabelle suddenly and turns off the TV
There is a loud crash from upstairs
The ghost woman in the bathtub screams
The ghost woman appears behind Jessabelle in the mirror
Mrs. Davis grabs Jessabelle around the head and pulls her back
Preston picks up Jessabelle and puts her in his truck, however when she turns around she has transformed into the ghost woman
The ghost woman screams as she suddenly appears in front of Preston
The TV turns on suddenly

Esther turns the lights on and off several times seeing the silhouette of a woman in the darkness each time. As Ether turns the lights off once more, the silhouette of the woman suddenly appears much closer to Esther than previous times
As the lights turn back on, the figure appears standing behind Paul
Paul is suddenly dragged away into the darkness
A shadowy figure appears on the other side of the door that Martin looks through
As the room goes dark once again, the silhouette attacks Rebecca
Rebecca is pulled towards the ceiling by Diana

Martin is suddenly pulled under the bed
As Martin backs away, Diana appears behind him
Martin is dragged along the floor by Diana
Diana pulls Bret away
Diana suddenly appears directly in front of Bret
Diana jumps out at Bret as he runs down the driveway
Sophie is thrown to the floor as she reaches for her pills
Rebecca shines the black light on a figure with its back turned to her, it suddenly turns around and screams
A hand grabs Rebecca around the wrist
Diana attacks a police officer
A hand reaches for Rebecca out of the slightly ajar door behind her
Diana drops down behind Rebecca
The homeless man suddenly yells “Shut up!” startling Jessica
A box is thrown in front of Jessica
Jessica sees a figure with a bloody pentagram on their face through the window on the door
The lights turn back on and we see two more bloodied figures with bags over their heads standing behind Jessica
There is a loud static noise as the bag-headed man moves around
The homeless man moves away from the door to reveal several figures hanging from the ceiling
The homeless man suddenly appears back at the window
A door slams
Jessica is knocked unconscious as she approaches an open door
Jessica sees a woman with a disfigured face under the table
The disfigured woman runs past the opening that Jessica is hiding in
Jessica opens her eyes and the disfigured woman is right in front of her
The homeless man passes behind Jessica
Jessica tases the homeless man and he turns to reveal a disfigured face with eyes that appear to have been removed and then stitched back into his head
The camera pans back up and one of the bag-headed cultists is standing behind Jessica
We see a close up of the bag-headed cultist’s face
Paymon screeches at Jessica from behind
During a very tense scene, Angela slowly approaches three mannequins by a window when one of them makes a hissing noise and briefly transforms into a person
An old man walks around the corner startling Jackson
During a tense scene, Angela turns around to see Elliot right beside her
A girl runs past the screen in the foreground
After Jackson says “Beth” one of the young girls appears in front of Jackson and Angela
Beth’s bloodied body appears by the window
A figure moves past the screen in front of Angela
A hand is placed on Angela’s shoulder
The woman wakes up and grabs Leah
Sudden shift to loud noises
Leah is suddenly hit from behind by her sister
Leah gasps loudly as she is woken up
Leah’s mom goes from sitting on the bed to charging towards her, causing Leah to wake up suddenly with a loud gasp
(Night #5) Katie suddenly wakes up out of bed gasping for air
(Night #5) The noise of something banging comes from another room
(Night #13) The couple wake up in their bed and a loud noise sounds from another room, followed by a bang

(Night #18) The bedroom door slams shut
(Night #18) The door slams shut again
Something bangs upstairs
(Night #21) Katie begins to scream loudly

The pan drops once more, causing Kristi to jump in fright

There is a loud bang on the front door

A skeleton lands on the wind-shield of the family car

Amy touches Eric on the shoulder

A spirit, standing behind Maddie, hits the camera

movies.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark

jump_scares.spoiler: Chuckie grabs Auggie from behind (as a joke)
As Chuckie hides from the woman in the bedroom, the door suddenly opens (but it is only Auggie behind it)
A door slams
As Tommy turns around, he comes face to face with the scarecrow
Auggie is suddenly pulled under the bed
The police chief is suddenly thrown against the cell
As Ramon drives away, The Jangly man suddenly lands on the windscreen
A man suddenly looks under the bed where Stella is hiding
A boy suddenly appears behind another boy who is lying in bed. [Video]
Dylan calls out “mom” during a tense scene
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, one of the people hanging upside down in the tape is attacked by an alligator in the water
The image of Bughuul can briefly be seen on the laptop screen

Bughuul can be seen in the reflection of the window

The radio begins playing again

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down

The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice

A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]

Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor

Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]

The nun puts her hand on Bill’s shoulder. [Video]
Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

jump_scares.spoiler: There is banging on the door
The shower shoots blood onto David
David charges forward with a knife
After a very tense scene Arne sees a woman who grabs him
The chainsaw starts up again in Arne’s hand
The demon Bruno charges out of the shadows
A hand comes out of the water bed
Arne’s head is grabbed by the demon behind him
Two girls with flashlights appear running and laughing

The body in the corner reanimates and runs at Ed
The woman is behind Lorraine after she closes the door

The door to the girl’s bedroom slams shut
Carolyn searches the house and a loud bang erupts from paintings falling off the wall
Carolyn enters the basement but as she goes to leave the door slams in her face
Hands clap behind Carolyn while she is in the basement
A monster appears on the top of the girl’s closet
A sheet blows off the washing line and catches around a figure

A window breaks as John is walking around outside the house

The phone once again rings during a quiet scene
The phone rings again
There is a cut to some loud chimes during a quiet scene
There is a sudden sound of chains
A silhouette suddenly jumps out right behind Michael up to his neck and screams “Out!

A box of pins suddenly drops down on a chair
The apartment door shuts off on its own
Carly is grabbed from behind and dragged into the darkness
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
A hand knocks out the garbage bag
The woman suddenly takes the hand of Detective Muldoon
After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
When Goodman’s colleague in the car turns around again, a screaming woman knocks on the car window. This is very startling
The camera pans to the left where suddenly a zombie stands in the light cone
Hands suddenly come out of the bathtub and reach for Peter
Peter turns around and suddenly the dead woman stands in front of him and screams at him
Suddenly the screaming ghost appears in the left corner of the cupboard
A screaming ghost appears over Faith. The sound effect is very sudden
A screaming ghost appears in the car behind Lorna
When Detective Muldoon turns off the light, a ghost appears before her
The ghost appears once again
The ghost suddenly opens the door
Just after the son runs into the dark corner of the room, the female ghost comes out of it shortly after and murmurs to Detective Muldoon
After it turns out that it is not Muldoon’s real son in her arms, the screaming spirit of a child suddenly appears in her arms
The hands on the door start pulling violently
A bloody body hits the roof
The coffin lid loudly slides off
Buzz bumps into a beam in the dark looking for an exit
A hand reached out under the Funhouse bunting and grabs Joey
The Funhouse electricity kicks on causing the animatronic monsters to move and the loud thunder and lightning sound effects to turn on
A skeleton leaps out of the floor and a rope drops around Richie’s neck
Liz falls screaming through a trap door
As Buzz attempts to comfort Amy, the monster-son falls between them and attacks Amy
The father, impaled on the sword grabs Buzz
Amy is started by the monster-son lurking amongst the Funhouse animatronic characters
The monster breaks through a locked door
A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
The banging on the wall resumes, much louder and faster than before. It continues on and off over the next few minutes
A door slams shut
Grace’s face suddenly appears from a trapdoor in the rafters causing Eleanor to scream. [Video]

movies.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman in the corner of the room suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lisa lies down on the bed and her daughter Heidi is revealed to be standing behind her
Andy opens the door and sees a raccoon standing there
Lisa pokes at the bush with a rake and sees a decomposing corpse. [Video]
Lisa sees a woman sitting by the bathtub
Lisa sees a blood covered hand move through the water
During a tense scene, the lights and radio turn back on
A shadowy figure watches Lisa in the kitchen
The decomposing corpse appears directly in front of Lisa as she opens her eyes. [Video]
Joyce sees the silhouette of a woman walking through the trees
Mr Gordy puts his hand on Heidi’s shoulder
Heidi suddenly sees an African American man swinging on the previously empty swing
Heidi sees someone hanging from a tree
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa turns around in bed and sees an African American woman with white eyes looking at her
As Lisa approaches the bathtub, the mummified corpse comes into view
During a vision, Joyce sees Heidi briefly take on a skeletal appearance
Heidi is woken by a loud thump
Heidi sees the spirit of an African American woman pass in front of her as she enters the piano room
A photo-frame with a picture of Heidi in it cracks
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa lies back down and sees a skeleton lying in bed beside her. [Video]
Something walks past Heidi while she is stuck in the hole
The mummified corpse appears in front of Heidi
The light beside Andy crackles, briefly startling him. As Andy walks back inside, a silhouette of a man can be seen watching him
Joyce sees a corpse-like figure appear at the trailer window
The rotting corpse of the stationmaster appears at the car window beside Heidi. [Video]
A man appears behind Lisa while she is looking in a cupboard
While driving Andy sees a female ghost standing on the road, causing him to swerve
Lisa looks back at Joyce who briefly appears as a decomposing corpse
Lisa is startled by various taxidermied animals around her
A mummified body falls on Lisa
As Lisa crawls through the hole, the stationmaster grabs her around the legs
Lisa is pulled through the hole
Accompanied by a sound effect a hand reaches out towards the camera
Accompanied by a sound effect, the silhoutte of a bird moves past a window behind Jess
As Jess looks through the window we get a quick cut to a closeup of the bird as it flies past the window once more
As Jess reaches out to pick up the toy tractor it suddenly moves towards her and a sound effect plays
A shadow moves past screen
Some ghostly legs can briefly be seen under a sheet as Denise makes the bed
An apparently dead bird suddenly squawks and flies away as Jess prods it with a piece of wood
The stairs suddenly collapse and several ghostly screams can be heard over the next minute or so
Ghostly hands reach out and grab Jess
There is a sudden transition from a quiet scene back to Jess being held back by the ghostly hands
John taps on the window
Accompanied by a sound effect, the camera suddenly zooms out
A shadowy figure moves past the screen
There is a loud bang
Ghostly hands grab Jess once more
The ghost grabs Jess around the ankle
A short, jarring flashback might startle some viewers
Accompanied by a sound effect, a figure walks past the screen
After staring at Jess for several seconds, the ghost suddenly lunges at her
There are a couple more sharp flashback cuts
Accompanied by a sound effect, Denise runs into John
The door slams shut on Jess and Bobby
The door bangs loudly as Jess approaches it
John smashes into the door from the other side causing Jess and Bobby to flee
The pitchfork comes through the door, narrowly missing Jess
John suddenly stabs Roy in the back
A hand comes out of the mud to grab Jess around the ankle
The security camera suddenly starts glitching
After Danielle says, “what’s happening to me?” it suddenly cuts back to the glitching security camera
A burnt hand appears from out of the pool
Illyana opens the door to find a picture of the smiley man on the wall. (Not really a classic jump scare, but still may startle some
The scene cuts to a loud shower after a freaky scene
The bear reappears over the closet and yells
A bat flies across the screen
A bucket is slammed to the ground
The eyes of the corpse are now open
The corpse shifts
The old man rushes out of the closet
The camera screams in Claire’s ear
Hemish bursts into the room
A demon is seen as Saul lights a lamp
A girl appears in front of Claire
The girls is standing in the room and looks up with a musical sting
As the sheet is pulled away the girl says “Help Me
Hard cut to a body coming out of a freezer
A sudden knocking at the door
The old woman startles Claire
The claws of the demon come out of the door as Claire reaches for it
A woman is seen looking under the table
Claire looks up and the demon lashes down at her
Benigna is revealed in the shed behind Laura accompanied by a startling sound
There is a loud crash as Laura listens against the wall
A presumably dead Benigna grabs Laura’s arm. [Video]
A window slides shut suddenly and breaks
A child’s hand grabs Laura from behind. [Video]
A hand slams the door closed
A shadow flies past Laura as she walks down the stairs
Heavy breathing can be heard behind Grace
Someone knocks at the door startling Grace
The door slams shut on Grace
The children are hiding in a closet when it is suddenly opened. [Video]
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
Caroline is surprised by a woman with milky eyes
Caroline turns around and almost walks into a man standing behind her. [Video
Ben grabs Caroline around the wrist
The door to the attic slams shut
Violet steps out in front of Caroline. [Video
Caroline bumps into something, she turns around quickly and sees a hanging Hoodoo doll. [Video
A flower-pot breaks as it is dropped to the floor
There is a loud clap of thunder while Caroline is performing the ritual on Ben
Luke comes up behind Caroline and attempts to strangle her with some cord
Violet lifts a sheet to reveal Ben who is holding some garden shears
Violet opens a door and appears in front of Caroline
The lights suddenly flicker
The flashlight illuminates the electrician
There is a sound effect as the camera moves into the mirror and the scene suddenly changes
The lights suddenly go out
The witch opens her eyes
The camera panes to the witch in the car with a sound effect
As Kate searches for Flora in the barn, something pops in the background
Kate suddenly finds herself in front of a horse that is being flushed out. The horse is not visible beforehand, a cheap thrill for no reason
As Kate tries to close the window, a ghost suddenly appears in the reflection. Very effective
Kate turns around and suddenly a mannequin is standing by her door
The sewing machine suddenly turns on as Kate leaves the room
A spider comes out of the ground and eats the ant
Kate jumps into the water as she thinks she sees Flora drowning. Shortly before Kate reaches the person under water she grabs her and screams
Kate dives in the tub when you recognize Miles Silhouette. Two seconds later a loud bang sounds for no reason
There is a figure in the mirror
Kate gets the flashlight ripped from her hand
Kate turns around and a mannequin stands behind her
A hand comes out of the water and pulls Kate in
Quint is suddenly visible in the rear view mirror of the car
Anna goes to open a bag when a corpse pops out and slumps to the ground, a few seconds later the corpse’s head turns to face Anna and it says “Don’t go home”
Anna looks through a crack in the door to the boathouse and has a flashback to her mother in bed
There is a metallic clanking noise as the door to Anna’s room is opened
A hand grabs Anna’s bed. [Video
A hand pops out from underneath a blanket
An empty can falls out of the rubbish bag Anna is looking through
Anna looks under the oven and sees a ghostly girl screaming. [Video
Anna walks backwards into a hole in the ground
Rachel appears at the car window as Anna attempts to drive off
Anna has a vision of her mother, but her face suddenly transforms into Rachel’s
Anna opens the rubbish bag and sees Rachel’s dead body
Roy grabs Kristen from behind as she tries to escape
A disfigured woman can briefly be seen during a lightning flash
Emily pops up in front of Kristen as she rifles through some files
The disfigured woman grabs Kristen around the neck while she is having a shower. [Video
A hand appears behind Kristen while she is hiding
The disfigured hand suddenly appears when Kristen looks in a morgue drawer. [Video
Kristen turns around and the ghost of Alice is standing right in front of her
Sarah looks in her pocket mirror and sees the ghost of Alice in the reflection
The ghost of Alice suddenly grabs Sarah from behind as she looks out a window
The ghost of Alice appears behind Emily and slashes her throat
The ghost of Alice appears behind Zoey while she is in the service lift
Kristen follows a trail of blood and then looks up to see Alice’s ghost standing in front of her
Kristen looks down the hallway and the camera follows. When the camera pans back, Alice’s ghost is standing behind her
After Dr Stringer finishes talking to Kristen, the ghost appears once more
Alice opens a cabinet above the sink and Kristen comes out and attacks her. [Video
A rocking chair unexpectedly moves as a child screams
There is a sudden vibrating sound
A figure unexpectedly appears, followed by a perfectly timed scream
After a somewhat intense scene, Catherine turns around quickly and bumps into her husband
A clown lamp explodes
A door slams shut
Something large suddenly crashes through the bedroom window
A sudden scene change to toast popping out of a toaster might startle some viewers
There is a second explosion (much louder and more violent than the initial one)
During a dream sequence a hand suddenly breaks through the window in front of Shideh
A figure moves past in the reflection of the window
Shideh looks through the peep hole in the door and sees a figure pass quickly through the hallway
Shideh sees a floating figure on the stairs
The floating spectre suddenly appears close to the camera
“Dorsa” looks up to reveal it is not her but an entity with a large set of teeth
The floating spectre suddenly grabs Dorsa
Dirty water starts pouring into the bath
A bird flies out of the fireplace
The bird flaps again
A man appears behind Arthur
As Arthur looks through a hole in the door, a face appears
Arthur spins a lamp and sees a face inside
Arthur looks up at a building window and sees a face inside
A face comes up behind Arthur as he looks out the window
Arthur touches the window and upon contact is greeted with a screaming lady
Arthur sees something in the mirror
A screaming face appears
Arthur opens the door and Mr. Bentley is standing there
The woman in black yells and slides towards Arthur
The woman in black screams once more
Arthur looks around the train station and sees the woman in black
Mr. Bentley sees the woman in black behind the train
Claire gets a shock from the bathroom power socket
An eye appears suddenly on the other side of the fence hole that Claire is looking through
Claire is startled by the phone ringing
The radio turns on suddenly
Claire looks into various rooms of her neighbours house with binoculars, in one of the rooms she sees Warren looking at her
Claire turns around and her husband is standing right behind her
The reflection of another woman can be seen in the bathtub water
The door opens during the Seance and the dog Cooper walks in
A reflection moves in the steamed-up bathroom mirror
Norman closes the fridge door and Claire is standing behind it
Norman appears behind Claire
Claire’s head falls back and she briefly appears as a decomposing corpse, startling Norman. [Video
Norman’s hand appears over the side of the bathtub
Claire stands on something sharp and screams
Norman’s fingers twitch as Claire tries to get the phone
Norman appears in the rear window of the ute
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone

Something hits the side of Kelly and Jim’s tent
